scripts.verify:maticmum: npm run verify:adv:maticmum && npm run verify:music:maticmum
scripts.verify:adv:maticmum: npx hardhat verify --network maticmum $ADV_ADDRESS AdvNFT ADV 0x909e9efE4D87d1a6018C2065aE642b6D0447bc91
scripts.verify:music:maticmum: npx hardhat verify --network maticmum $MUSIC_ADDRESS MusicNFT MZK $ADV_ADDRESS
